lead_paragraph: Quintin E. Primo III, the chief of Capri Capital Partners, says new college graduates should leave the United States to broaden their cultural horizons.
snippet: Quintin E. Primo III, the chief of Capri Capital Partners, says new college graduates should leave the United States to broaden their cultural horizons.

headline.main: Get a Diploma, but Then Get a Passport
headline.seo: Get a Diploma, but Then Get a Passport, Says Capri Capital’s Chief
headline.print_headline: Get a Diploma, but Then Get a Passport
